channel.title: Internet on Liu Qiran
channel.description: Recent content in Internet on Liu Qiran

item.title: Stickers
item.description: Why do I no longer use stickers? For me, the use of stickers distorts the understanding of others. I don’t think it’s an effective or appropriate way to communicate with others online. The Internet is already full of entertaining and useless information. Using stickers will make this situation worse. Using words is enough to convey accurate information. Although without stickers, some people will think that it will feel that there is no emotion. But the truth is that the Internet cannot emulate the real conversation. Calling and talking face to face may be a better way for communication.

item.title: Update home page
item.description:
Added progress bars and more social icons for home page.

Added the feature which can share posts on Mastodon.
